about_the_game:
[Game Background]
"1000 Princes" is a female-oriented 3D visual novel romance game.

Q1: Why are there 1,000 princes by your side?
You’re an ordinary girl who happens to rescue a pink pig one day. However, this pig is actually a pet from a higher-dimensional cosmic time management bureau. It was locked in a server room, fainted from hunger, and ended up chewing on cables to survive. Unfortunately, it bit through your timeline, causing chaos in your time clock's magnetic field. As a result, all your prince husbands from past lives, the present, and future timelines have time-traveled to the era where you now reside. You suddenly find yourself surrounded by every husband you've ever had—at the same time!Your prince husbands come from various periods in human history, spanning ancient times, the modern era, the present, and the future. Some hail from domestic lands, others from foreign countries, some from the living world, and others from the underworld. Among them are a primitive man from the Stone Age, a fire and water general from ancient times, an arms dealer from the modern era, a power company CEO from the present day, an alien from the future planet Bike Star, and even a ghost king from the underworld. They represent different times and professions, yet all 1,000 princes are handsome, wealthy, and devoted to you with tender affection.

Q2: What happens on this shared timeline?
On this shared timeline, you and your 1,000 princes will face countless unbelievable challenges and dangers. Together, you’ll solve puzzles, embark on adventures, and overcome hardships. Through these experiences, you’ll grow closer, communicate, and support one another. The princes will protect and cherish you, saving you from various predicaments while vying to bring you to their individual timelines. However, issues arise on this crowded shared timeline—such as identity conflicts and the enormous group of men attracting police and media attention.

Q3: What is the goal of the 1,000 princes?
Higher-dimensional controllers understand that a soul’s long journey through reincarnation can be rewound, replayed, or fast-forwarded like a video. However, they do not want low-dimensional humans on Earth to uncover the secrets of time and space. The pink pig’s escape has jeopardized these secrets, putting you in danger of assassination. The 1,000 princes have one mission: to protect you from being killed. Guarding you, cherishing you, and loving you is their shared duty. You are the center of their world, their precious treasure!

However, the assassins from the higher dimension can take on countless forms and identities, launching relentless attacks against you. The 1,000 princes will do everything in their power to keep you safe. Escaping to a specific prince’s individual timeline is a way to hide from danger. So, who will you choose as your one true love?


[Game Content & Features]
1 Common Route Storyline
The first Team Romance, "Elevator Love Rescue", features a debut lineup of 10 princes arriving in your timeline for the first time, offering a sweet story filled with both thrills and romance. In the common route, you can experience stunning visuals and an engaging storyline while solving puzzles, collecting items, and escaping challenging situations. In the future, more Team Romances will be continuously updated, with the prince team doing their utmost to protect and love you...

2 Individual Route Storyline
Currently, a preview and demo of the individual route for the first prince, Ling Tian, are available. Prince Ling Tian already has a standalone game. In the future, more individual routes for the other princes will be added. In this section, you can explore each prince's profile and preview or try out parts of their individual routes.

3 Songs
Unlock new songs as you progress. Shared timeline themes are sung by all the princes, while individual routes feature solo performances by each prince.

4.Mini-Games
Enjoy various mini-games related to the 1,000 princes’ world.

5.Group Chat
Engage in group chats with the princes via a mobile app, track their social media updates, and discover vital clues for puzzles.

6.Library Files
Read daily news featuring the princes, access their diaries, and gather information from various documents.

7.Lucky Draw

8.Prince Album
View photos and memories of your time with the princes.


[Update Frequency]
"1000 Princes" focuses on the shared storyline and is completely free—no ads, no in-app purchases. Because all 1,000 princes love you deeply and unconditionally, asking for nothing in return, this game is completely free to play.Sweet romance storylines will be regularly updated for free. Through these updates, you can explore the shared timeline and ultimately choose your favorite prince to enter their individual romantic route!

【Introduction to the 1000 Princes Series】
"1000 Princes" is a large-scale romance series for women! It includes a sweet and romantic otome game series and easy-to-learn multilingual educational e-books.

🍰 "1000 Princes" Otome Games: Available on STEAM and Google Play
📕 "1000 Princes" Multilingual Educational E-Books: Available on Google Play
└ 🅿️ Multilingual Learning by "1000 Princes" Developer, Ginyan: Available on YouTube
🍒 "1000 Princes" Theme Songs & Music: Available on YouTube
🌸 "1000 Princes" Official Website



【About the Developer】
Ginyan, the developer of 1000 Princes, is an independent otome game developer and e-book author specializing in foreign language learning books and romantic novels. Passionate about fantasy, technology, and language learning, I began studying iClone and Character Creator (CC) for 3D animation during the COVID-19 lockdown, along with the Unity game engine. The 1000 Princes game series is developed using a combination of AI tools, the Unity engine, and Naninovel.

name: 1000王子

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: Pentium3 1.0GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 9600 GS,Radeon HD4000
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: 1000 Princes is a female-oriented 3D visual novel romance game. A fracture in your timeline has caused all your prince husbands—spanning past, present and future from different settings—to time-travel to your current era. Now1,000 princes coexist on your shared timeline, protecting and adoring you.
supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
